DOC.brief_summary: 24 week open label study to compare the treatment either with rosuvastatin or rosuvastatin plus initiatives to improve compliance. If the subject does not reach the EAS LDL-C treatment goal at week 12, rosuvastatin will be titrated from 10mg to 20mg.
DOC.brief_title: ORBITAL: Open-Label Primary Care Study: Rosuvastatin Based Compliance Initiatives Linked To Achievement Of LDL Goals
